fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, the host will randomly assign you a role to be disguised as for the duration of the game. When you die, you will appear to be that role. Additionally, any abilities or attributes that would return information based on your role will actually return information based on your disguised role.
- The role that the host assigns to be your disguise must be able to produce feedback messages in either the day chat or other players' personal channels. If they roll one that cannot do so, they will reroll it until they get one that does.
- If any of your chat messages, will, or custom-made feedback messages (made by roles like Hypnotist that can make whatever messages they want) directly or indirectly indicate that you are a Psyop, your win condition becomes None.
- If you are in a low-activity time zone, you may reroll this for free.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pretend to use an ability that your disguised role has. You will not actually use the ability, but it will produce feedback messages as though you did use it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that either your name, your disguised role, or an ability or attribute of your disguised role is mentioned a minimum of 5 times each day by players other than yourself. You may win while dead. If you are hanged, this amount is lowered to 1.
